content.en: Multiple-Instance Learning: Researchers have been exploring various questions in the field of multiple-instance learning, which involves learning from sets of instances called bags. Algorithms such as MILES, Bamic, and MILIS have been developed to address these questions and improve the efficiency and performance of multiple-instance learning. These algorithms use techniques like feature selection, instance selection, and discriminant analysis to extract meaningful information from bags and classify them accurately.
content.da: Multiple-instance learning: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål inden for området multiple-instance learning, som involverer læring fra sæt af forekomster kaldet poser. Algoritmer som MILES, Bamic og MILIS er blevet udviklet for at besvare disse spørgsmål og forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af multiple-instance learning. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som feature selection, instance selection og diskriminant analyse til at udtrække meningsfuld information fra poser og klassificere dem nøjagtigt.
